web_snippets: About Carolyn Elefant (Brandeis University BA 1985, Cornell Law JD 1988). In 2002, Carolyn created the blog MyShingle.com, the longest-running blog on solo ...
Carolyn Elefant owns the Law Offices of Carolyn Elefant. She launched MyShingle.com in 2002. It was the very first blog for and about solo and small law firms.
... Carolyn Elefant, the trailblazing founder of MyShingle.com, who has been redefining what it means to be a solo practitioner in the legal world.
